main.name: Khadija Hawa
main.description:
WELCOM TO MY PORTFOLIO
 I am a web development engineer and I use react and javascript to develop web pages. Here you can see my work and get to know me better
main.bio: a passionate, curious, and ambitious front-end developer who is majoring in computer science at Istanbul Medeniyet University. My analytical skills allowed me to progress rapidly in this industry which requires much processing, exploring, analyzing, and coding to succeed.My past working experience revolves around building web and mobile-based applications using ReactJs, React-Native, Design libraries (MaterialUi, AntDesign, Bootstrap, etc..), Redux (Redux-Rematch, Redux-Thunk), and open-source libraries such as Axios.I am currently learning backend development I am always interested in working with passionate, smart-working, and hard-working teams.
main.contactmessage: PLEASE FEEL FREE TO SEND ME A MESSAGE

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description:
as a front-end web developer, I am working on a No-code builder app that allows normal users to have the ability to make mobile apps without having coding experienc 
 My tasks:
 -Developing and maintaining user interface.
 -Fixing bugs and testing usability
 -optimizing the user experience -working on responsiveness for mobile versions 
- managing software workflow-Using APIs and RESTful Services

projects.title: mad libz
projects.category: Mad Libs is a phrasal template word game, the player can change the existed text as he/she wishes by adding verbs or adjectives

projects.title: To Do App
projects.category: A to do App designed in Figma and made in react native the app has 3 screens the first one is a simple to-do app the second one has data fetched from a public API and the third screen has each of the fetched data rendered in a single page with specific user's details
